title: 有没有匠魂的mod，只要匠魂和匠魂的其他所有拓展，我想单玩匠魂，谢谢了
author: 东东yang

replies.author: 燕了个舟
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-661201-1-1.html匠魂2
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/mantle匠魂前置（地幔）
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-786419-1-1.html匠魂兵工厂/匠魂护甲
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-846907-1-1.html如果加了拔刀剑可以加这个刀锻冶匠魂]匠魂与拔刀剑的融合
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/tometinkers?gameCategorySlug=mc-mods&projectID=308189给匠魂添加了一些装饰品
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/tinkers-complement匠魂补充
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-646118-1-1.html匠魂工具升级
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-686520-1-1.html匠魂防御
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/tinker-i-o匠魂接口，可以匠魂自动化
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/plustic匠魂扩充
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/tinkers-addons添加了1.7.10的自我修复
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=670143匠魂合金附加
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/armory-expansion匠魂兵工厂扩展
